IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE HOUSING AND VOCATIONAL TRAINING TO PEOPLE WITH DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: CLEARBROOK PROVIDES RESIDENTIAL AND OTHER SERVICES TO INDIVIDUALS WITH DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILIITIES.
IRS990.Desc: FOUR INTERMEDIATE CARE FACILITIES PROVIDING 24 HOUR CARE FOR 133 DEVELOPMENTALLY AND PHYSICALLY DISABLED ADULTS, INCLUDING NURSING, DIETARY, MEDICAL AND RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: GROUP HOMES SERVING 248 ADULTS WITH DEVELOPMENTAL AND PHYSICAL DISABILITIES, PROVIDING RESIDENTIAL SERVICES IN CILA, SLA AND HOME SETTINGS WITH DIRECT SERVICE SUPPORT UP TO 24 HOURS PER DAY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: DAY PROGRAMS FOR DEVELOPMENTALLY DISABLED ADULTS, SERVING OVER 600 CLIENTS INCLUDING SHELTERED WORKSHOP, DEVELOPMENTAL TRAINING, EMPLOYMENT SERVICES TRAINING, AND TRANSPORTATION SERVICES.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: CHILDRENS (0-3) SERVICES, FAMILY COMMUNITY RESCOURCE CENTER, RESPITE CARE FOR 100 PLUS DEVELOPMENTALLY DISABLED CHILDREN AS WELL AS CLINICAL AND THERAPEUTIC SERVICES. ALSO PROVIDES ASSESSMENTS AND CASE COORDINATION SERVICES AS WELL AS STATE REQUIRED STAFF TRAINING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FEES PAID TO CONSULTANT FOR LOBBYING

THE ORGANIZATION'S ENDOWMENT FUND CONSISTS OF ONE INDIVIDUAL FUND ESTABLISHED FOR A VARIETY OF PURPOSES. IT FUNDS THE FOLLOWING PROGRAMS: CLINIC, C.H.I.L.D. PROGRAM, PARTNERS IN ADULT LEARNING PROGRAM, DESIGNATED FUNDS PROGRAM, CLIENT CULTURAL EVENTS, INTERMEDIATE CARE FACILITIES AND ENDOWMENT EARNINGS.
AFFILIATED ORGANIZATION REVENUE INCLUDED ON COMBINED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS 503,896. RENTAL EXPENSES 255,831. SPECIAL EVENT AND GAMING EXPENSES 432,450.
AFFILIATED ORGANIZATION EXPENSES INCLUDED ON COMBINED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS 492,684. SPECIAL EVENT AND GAMING EXPENSES 432,450. RENTAL EXPENSES 255,831.

IRS990ScheduleG.GamingManagerServicesProvTxt: VP IN CHARGE OF DEVELOPMENT, INCLUDING GAMING

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AS INDICATED IN SCHEDULE J, PART II, THE PRESIDENT RECEIVED BONUSES BASED ON PERFORMANCE AND THE FINANCIAL RESULTS OF THE ORGANIZATION. THESE BONUSES ARE APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S MANAGEMENT PREPARES AND REVIEWS THE FORM 990 INFORMATION, WHICH IS THEN REVIEWED BY AN INDEPENDENT CPA FIRM. A FULL COPY IS PROVIDED TO THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD PRIOR TO FILING THE RETURN WITH THE IRS. THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD IS PROVIDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME TO REVIEW THE RETURN AND ASK ANY QUESTIONS DIRECTLY TO THE ORGANIZATION'S MANAGEMENT OR THE INDEPENDENT CPA FIRM PRIOR TO FILING. THE BOARD RECEIVES A COPY OF THE FORM 990 AFTER IT IS FILED WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENTS (DISCLOSURES) ARE SIGNED BY EACH BOARD MEMBER AT THE BEGINNING OF EACH FISCAL YEAR. AUDIT PROCEDURES ARE PERFORMED WHEREBY CROSS CHECKING OF ADDRESSES OF BOARD MEMBERS AND EMPLOYEES ARE COMPARED TO VENDOR LISTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION OF THE PRESIDENT IS EVALUATED BY A GROUP LED BY THE CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD. THE EVALUATION TAKES INTO ACCOUNT THE SPECIFIC JOB REQUIREMENTS UNIQUE TO THE PRESIDENT POSITION AND THE COMPENSATION OF SIMILARLY SITUATED PRESIDENTS OF LIKE EXEMPT ORGANIZATIONS. THE PRESIDENT'S COMPENSATION IS APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE COMPENSATION OF OTHER OFFICERS IS DETERMINED BY THE PRESIDENT USING THE SAME PROCESS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: UPON REQUEST, CLEARBROOK VP FINANCE WILL PROVIDE COPIES OF DOCUMENTS OPEN FOR PUBLIC RECORD, INCLUDING FORM(S) 990 AND 990T, ANNUAL FINANCIAL STATEMENT AUDITS, AND THE ORGANIZATION'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY.

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: AUGUSTANA GROUP HOME FOR THE HANDICAPPED INC
